title: 1940–41 Hibernian F.C. season
text: During the 1940–41 season <a href="Hibernian%20F.C.">Hibernian</a>, a <a href="association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Edinburgh">Edinburgh</a>, came third out of 16 clubs in the <a href="Southern%20Football%20League%20%28Scotland%29">Southern Football League</a>.
